sakai:query-template: (type:u AND (name:(${q}) OR firstName:(${q}) OR lastName:(${q}) OR email:(${q}) OR title:(${q}) OR content:(${q}) OR widgetdata:(${q}) OR ngram:(${q}) OR edgengram:(${q})${_taguuids})) OR (type:g ${_categoryAnd} AND (name:(${q}) OR title:(${q}) OR description:(${q}) OR content:(${q}) OR widgetdata:(${q}) OR ngram:(${q}) OR edgengram:(${q})${_taguuids})) OR (content:(${q}) OR filename:(${q}) OR tag:(${q}) OR description:(${q}) OR ngram:(${q}) OR edgengram:(${q}) ${_tags}${_usedin})
sakai:title: General
sakai:shortDescription: Get general nodes out of the repository.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "The term you want to match against. This will match any property on the general profile"}
{"name" : "sakai:tags", "description" : "A comma seperated list of tags that the file(s) should match"}
{"name" : "usedin", "description" : "Filter files based on where they are used (linked to.) This can be a multivalued parameter."}
{"name" : "sortOn", "description" : "The name of the property you wish to sort on. This only has any affect if it is used with the sortOrder parameter. The default is score"}
{"name" : "sortOrder", "description" : "The order you wish to sort in. Either 'asc' or 'desc'."}
sakai:description: Get user profile nodes out of the repository filtered by a username, get group profile nodes out of the repository filtered by any value on the profile node.
sakai:response:
Doing a standard query searching for all profiles matching 'awesome'.
